summary: A lazy youth failing to take up any responsibility is sent to work with his father's friend in Goa where he meets a woman who has problems of her own.
cast: Akshay Kumar|Amy Jackson|Lara Dutta|Kay Kay Menon|Rati Agnihotri|Yograj Singh|Pradeep Singh Rawat|Anil Charanjeett|Arfi Lamba|Kunal Kapoor|Murli Sharma|Boiangiu Alma|George Burcea|Ahran Chaudhary|Durgesh Raje|Kuldeep Sharma|Mahru Sheikh|Harkirat Pal Singh|Yuri Suri|Prabhu Deva|Sunny Leone
title: Singh Is Bliing
